body:
hostsPlus
================

hostsPlus is a editor for manage hosts file.


Features
================

1. Multi Hosts file Manage.
2. Multi Group in single hosts file.
3. Redirect domain to host name or another domain.
4. Switch DNS.
5. Theme support.
